subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Joey Votto, the Reds’ first baseman earned 31 of 32 first-place votes after helping Cincinnati to its first playoff berth since 1995.
snippet: Joey Votto, the Reds’ first baseman earned 31 of 32 first-place votes after helping Cincinnati to its first playoff berth since 1995.
